inter_pos_of_cond_ne_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
theorem inter_pos_of_cond_ne_zero (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hcst : probability_theory.cond μ t s ≠ 0) : 0 < μ (s ∩ t) :=
  by
  refine' pos_iff_ne_zero.mpr (right_ne_zero_of_mul _)
  · exact (μ s)⁻¹
  convert hcst
  simp [hms, Set.inter_comm]
#align inter_pos_of_cond_ne_zero inter_pos_of_cond_ne_zero
cond_univ:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
@[simp]
theorem cond_univ [ProbabilityMeasure μ] : probability_theory.cond_fn μ Set.univ = μ := by
  simp [cond, measure_univ, measure.restrict_univ]
#align cond_univ cond_univ
cond_pos_of_inter_ne_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
theorem cond_pos_of_inter_ne_zero [FiniteMeasure μ] (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hci : μ (s ∩ t) ≠ 0) :
    0 < (probability_theory.cond_fn μ s) t := by
  rw [cond_apply _ hms]
  refine' ENNReal.mul_pos _ hci
  exact ennreal.inv_ne_zero.mpr (measure_ne_top _ _)
#align cond_pos_of_inter_ne_zero cond_pos_of_inter_ne_zero
cond_mul_eq_inter':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
theorem cond_mul_eq_inter' (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hcs : μ s ≠ 0) (hcs' : μ s ≠ ennreal.top) (t : Set Ω) :
    probability_theory.cond μ t s * μ s = μ (s ∩ t) := by
  rw [cond_apply μ hms t, mul_comm, ← mul_assoc, ENNReal.mul_inv_cancel hcs hcs', one_mul]
#align cond_mul_eq_inter' cond_mul_eq_inter'
cond_mul_eq_inter:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
theorem cond_mul_eq_inter [FiniteMeasure μ] (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hcs : μ s ≠ 0) (t : Set Ω) :
    probability_theory.cond μ t s * μ s = μ (s ∩ t) :=
  cond_mul_eq_inter' μ hms hcs (measure_ne_top _ s) t
#align cond_mul_eq_inter cond_mul_eq_inter
cond_is_probability_measure:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Rishikesh Vaishnav. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Rishikesh Vaishnav
-/
/-- The conditional probability measure of any finite measure on any set of positive measure
is a probability measure. -/
theorem cond_is_probability_measure [FiniteMeasure μ] (hcs : μ s ≠ 0) :
    ProbabilityMeasure <| probability_theory.cond_fn μ s :=
  ⟨by
    rw [cond, measure.smul_apply, measure.restrict_apply MeasurableSet.univ, Set.univ_inter]
    exact ENNReal.inv_mul_cancel hcs (measure_ne_top _ s)⟩
#align cond_is_probability_measure cond_is_probability_measure
cond_inter_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
theorem cond_inter_self (hms : MeasurableSet s) (t : Set Ω) :
    probability_theory.cond μ (s ∩ t) s = probability_theory.cond μ t s := by
  rw [cond_apply _ hms, ← Set.inter_assoc, Set.inter_self, ← cond_apply _ hms]
#align cond_inter_self cond_inter_self
cond_eq_inv_mul_cond_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/-- **Bayes' Theorem** -/
theorem cond_eq_inv_mul_cond_mul [FiniteMeasure μ] (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hmt : MeasurableSet t) :
    probability_theory.cond μ t s = (μ s)⁻¹ * probability_theory.cond μ s t * μ t :=
  by
  by_cases ht : μ t = 0
  · simp [cond, ht, measure.restrict_apply hmt, or.inr (measure_inter_null_of_null_left s ht)]
  · rw [mul_assoc, cond_mul_eq_inter μ hmt ht s, Set.inter_comm, cond_apply _ hms]
#align cond_eq_inv_mul_cond_mul cond_eq_inv_mul_cond_mul
cond_empty:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
@[simp]
theorem cond_empty : probability_theory.cond_fn μ ∅ = 0 := by simp [cond]
#align cond_empty cond_empty
cond_cond_eq_cond_inter':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
theorem cond_cond_eq_cond_inter' (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hmt : MeasurableSet t) (hcs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hci : μ (s ∩ t) ≠ 0) :
    probability_theory.cond_fn (probability_theory.cond_fn μ s) t = probability_theory.cond_fn μ (s ∩ t) :=
  by
  have hcs : μ s ≠ 0 := (μ.to_outer_measure.pos_of_subset_ne_zero (Set.inter_subset_left _ _) hci).ne'
  ext u
  simp [*, hms.inter hmt, cond_apply, ← mul_assoc, ← Set.inter_assoc, ENNReal.mul_inv, mul_comm, ← mul_assoc,
    ENNReal.inv_mul_cancel]
#align cond_cond_eq_cond_inter' cond_cond_eq_cond_inter'
cond_cond_eq_cond_inter:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond_fn -/
/-- Conditioning first on `s` and then on `t` results in the same measure as conditioning
on `s ∩ t`. -/
theorem cond_cond_eq_cond_inter [FiniteMeasure μ] (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hmt : MeasurableSet t)
    (hci : μ (s ∩ t) ≠ 0) :
    probability_theory.cond_fn (probability_theory.cond_fn μ s) t = probability_theory.cond_fn μ (s ∩ t) :=
  cond_cond_eq_cond_inter' μ hms hmt (measure_ne_top μ s) hci
#align cond_cond_eq_cond_inter cond_cond_eq_cond_inter
cond_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/-- The axiomatic definition of conditional probability derived from a measure-theoretic one. -/
theorem cond_apply (hms : MeasurableSet s) (t : Set Ω) : probability_theory.cond μ t s = (μ s)⁻¹ * μ (s ∩ t) :=
  by
  rw [cond, measure.smul_apply, measure.restrict_apply' hms, Set.inter_comm]
  rfl
#align cond_apply cond_apply
cond_add_cond_compl_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `probability_theory.cond -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/-- A version of the law of total probability. -/
theorem cond_add_cond_compl_eq [FiniteMeasure μ] (hms : MeasurableSet s) (hcs : μ s ≠ 0) (hcs' : μ («expr ᶜ» s) ≠ 0) :
    probability_theory.cond μ t s * μ s + probability_theory.cond μ t («expr ᶜ» s) * μ («expr ᶜ» s) = μ t :=
  by
  rw [cond_mul_eq_inter μ hms hcs, cond_mul_eq_inter μ hms.compl hcs', Set.inter_comm _ t, Set.inter_comm _ t]
  exact measure_inter_add_diff t hms
#align cond_add_cond_compl_eq cond_add_cond_compl_eq
